channel.title: Telco on Adib.notes
channel.description: Recent content in Telco on Adib.notes

item.title: Leveraging Telco Data Beyond Traditional Telco Business
item.description: This is a collaborative event from Thrive of Telkomsel with Data Science Indonesia. In this session, I talked about how we (INDICO) leverage telco data beyond traditional telco business. We explore the benefits of telco data, what it might contains, and what kind of potential application it can do to your business.
